plot: In the fresh fruit market in Hong Kong, fruits are mixed with prostitution, gambling, drug addiction and gangs. Innocence is sold by a girl, at a price of $20.
title: Twenty Dollars
plot_es: In the fresh fruit market in Hong Kong, fruits are mixed with prostitution, gambling, drug addiction and gangs. Innocence is sold by a girl, at a price of $20.
